lightbox_type.label: Lightbox Type
lightbox_type.comment: You can customize the settings of selected Lightbox Type from the below tabs.

popupimage_size.label: Popup Image Size
popupimage_size.comment:
Size in [Width]x[Height] Format. Example: 800x600
Note: If left empty Popup Image will take the full size.

disable_zoombar.label: Disable Zoom Bar
disable_zoombar.comment: This will hide the default Zoom bar and will give main image the lightbox effect.

include_mainimage_in_lightbox.label: Include Main Image In 'More Views' Lightbox Gallery
include_mainimage_in_lightbox.comment: This will include main image in 'More Views' lightbox gallery view.

include_jquery.label: Include jQuery file
include_jquery.comment:
You can disable the jQuery inclusion if it's already included.
Default: Yes

include_jquery_from.label: Include jQuery file from
include_jquery_from.comment:
You can use Google CDN if your site goes live as this will decrease the load time for jQuery. If you are using Google CDN option in localhost, make sure to check the internet connection else you will get some javascript error.
Default: Local (Version 1.7.1)

include_jquery_in.label: Include jQuery file in
include_jquery_in.comment:
Default: Head.
Note that jQuery.noConflict() is included implicitly

include_globally.label: Include Lightbox files globally
include_globally.comment:
If 'Yes' option is selected, then it will include the lightbox files (js + css) so that it can be used outside of product description page also. For example: CMS Pages/Static Blocks, 3rd party modules like Image Gallery etc.
Default: No
Note: Make sure to check that Lightbox files are included in Head in order to make it work globally.

global_initialization_code.label: Lightbox initialization code for global usage
global_initialization_code.comment:
This field becomes handy when you are using lightbox files globally. You can initialize any no of any type of lightbox here, For Example:
  jQuery("a[rel=iframeFancybox]").fancybox({
    'type' : 'iframe',
    'width' : 800,
    'height' : 600
});
and can simply call from your custom pages, cms pages, static blocks etc easily.
Note You don't need to wrap the code within <script> tag & document ready code: jQuery(document).ready(function(){ code.

padding.label: padding
padding.comment: Space between FancyBox wrapper and content.

margin.label: margin
margin.comment: Space between viewport and FancyBox wrapper.

opacity.label: opacity
opacity.comment: When true, transparency of content is changed for elastic transitions.

modal.label: modal
modal.comment: When true, 'overlayShow' is set to 'true' and 'hideOnOverlayClick', 'hideOnContentClick', 'enableEscapeButton', 'showCloseButton' are set to 'false'.

cyclic.label: cyclic
cyclic.comment: When true, galleries will be cyclic, allowing you to keep pressing next/back.

scrolling.label: scrolling
scrolling.comment: Set the overflow CSS property to create or hide scrollbars. Can be set to 'auto', 'yes', or 'no'

autoScale.label: autoScale
autoScale.comment: If true, FancyBox is scaled to fit in viewport

centerOnScroll.label: centerOnScroll
centerOnScroll.comment: When true, FancyBox is centered while scrolling page.

hideOnOverlayClick.label: hideOnOverlayClick
hideOnOverlayClick.comment: Toggle if clicking the overlay should close FancyBox

hideOnContentClick.label: hideOnContentClick
hideOnContentClick.comment: Toggle if clicking the content should close FancyBox

overlayOpacity.label: overlayOpacity
overlayOpacity.comment: Opacity of the overlay (from 0 to 1; default - 0.3)

titlePosition.label: titlePosition
titlePosition.comment: The position of title. Can be set to 'outside', 'inside' or 'over'

transitionIn.label: transitionIn
transitionIn.comment: The transition type. Can be set to 'elastic', 'fade' or 'none'

transitionOut.label: transitionOut
transitionOut.comment: The transition type. Can be set to 'elastic', 'fade' or 'none'

speedIn.label: speedIn
speedIn.comment: Speed of the fade and elastic transitions, in milliseconds

speedOut.label: speedOut
speedOut.comment: Speed of the fade and elastic transitions, in milliseconds

changeSpeed.label: changeSpeed
changeSpeed.comment: Speed of resizing when changing gallery items, in milliseconds

changeFade.label: changeFade
changeFade.comment: Speed of the content fading while changing gallery items

enableEscapeButton.label: enableEscapeButton
enableEscapeButton.comment: Toggle if pressing Esc button closes FancyBox

slideShow.label: slideShow
slideShow.comment: true == slideshow on, false == slideshow off

slideSpeed.label: slideSpeed
slideSpeed.comment: slideshow duration in seconds(3 to 6 Recommended)

piro_speed.label: piro_speed
piro_speed.comment: Select Pirobox speed, from 500 to 1000 (700 recommended)

piro_scroll.label: piro_scroll
piro_scroll.comment: pirobox always positioned at the center of the page

allow_resize.label: allow_resize
allow_resize.comment: Resize the photos bigger than viewport. true/false

counter_separator_label.label: counter_separator_label
counter_separator_label.comment: The separator for the gallery counter 1 "of" 2

horizontal_padding.label: horizontal_padding
horizontal_padding.comment: The padding on each side of the picture

hideflash.label: hideflash
hideflash.comment: Hides all the flash object on a page, set to TRUE if flash appears over prettyPhoto

modal.label: modal
modal.comment: If set to true, only the close button will close the window

overlay_gallery.label: overlay_gallery
overlay_gallery.comment: If set to true, a gallery will overlay the fullscreen image on mouse over

social_tools.label: social_tools
social_tools.comment: If set to false, will hide the social tool (twitter/facebook) from lightbox

overlayBgColor.label: overlayBgColor
overlayBgColor.comment: Used to define the overlay background color. #000 (black) is default.

overlayOpacity.label: overlayOpacity
overlayOpacity.comment: Used to define the overlay opacity. 0.8 is default.

containerBorderSize.label: containerBorderSize
containerBorderSize.comment: The padding CSS information used in the container image box. 10 is default.

containerResizeSpeed.label: containerResizeSpeed
containerResizeSpeed.comment: The duration of resize effect in the container image box. 400 is default.

txtImage.label: txtImage
txtImage.comment: Text "Image" used in the image caption.

txtOf.label: txtOf
txtOf.comment: Text "of" used in the image caption.
